data.value: We're working hard to bring you this section very soon.

data.name: Home_HeroDescription
data.value: Send and receive messages, manage chats, groups, and channels easily with our enterprise-grade API. Pay per WhatsApp account, no per-message fees.

data.name: Home_TrialInfo
data.value: 3-day free trial • No credit card required • Cancel anytime

data.name: FeatureFastApiDesc
data.value: Integrate WhatsApp in seconds with our simple yet powerful REST API. Average response time < 100ms.

data.name: FeatureSecurityDesc
data.value: JWT authentication, end-to-end encryption, and GDPR compliance. Your data is protected.

data.name: FeatureAnalyticsDesc
data.value: Monitor delivery, response, and engagement metrics with interactive dashboards.

data.name: FeatureWebhooksDesc
data.value: Receive instant notifications for incoming messages and delivery statuses.

data.name: FeatureInstancesDesc
data.value: Manage multiple WhatsApp numbers from a single platform. Ideal for teams.

data.name: FeatureMediaDesc
data.value: Send images, videos, audio, documents, and locations without limitations.

data.name: HomeCtaSubtitle
data.value: Join over 1,000 developers already trusting WaHub

data.name: FooterTagline
data.value: The most reliable WhatsApp API platform for developers.

data.name: Routes_PageNotFoundMessage
data.value: The page you are looking for does not exist.

data.name: Privacy_AccountInfo_Intro
data.value: When you create an account with us, we collect:

data.name: Privacy_ServiceUsage_Intro
data.value: To provide and improve our service, we collect:

data.name: Privacy_ProvideSupport
data.value: Provide technical support and customer service

data.name: Privacy_ImproveUsage
data.value: Analyze usage patterns to optimize features

data.name: Privacy_ImproveFixes
data.value: Identify and fix errors or performance issues

data.name: Privacy_AnswerSupport
data.value: Respond to inquiries and support requests

data.name: Privacy_DetectFraud
data.value: Detect and prevent fraud or misuse

data.name: Privacy_ComplyLegal
data.value: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

data.name: Privacy_Section4_1
data.value: 4.1 We Do Not Sell Personal Data

data.name: Privacy_NoSellData
data.value: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

data.name: Privacy_ShareCircumstances
data.value: We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

data.name: Privacy_ThirdPartyIntegrations
data.value: For integrations with third-party services you configure

data.name: Privacy_SpecificFeatures
data.value: For specific features that require data sharing

data.name: Privacy_CourtOrders
data.value: To comply with court orders or subpoenas

data.name: Privacy_LawsRegulations
data.value: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

data.name: Privacy_InvestigateViolations
data.value: To investigate possible violations of our terms

data.name: Privacy_TransactionNote
data.value: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction, with the same privacy protections.

data.name: Privacy_SecurityMeasures_Intro
data.value: We implement multiple layers of security to protect your information:

data.name: Privacy_TLS
data.value: TLS/SSL encryption for data in transit

data.name: Privacy_AES256
data.value: AES-256 encryption for data at rest

data.name: Privacy_BreachNotification
data.value: In the unlikely event of a security breach affecting your personal data, we will notify you within 72 hours of becoming aware of the incident, as required by applicable regulations.

data.name: Privacy_Retention_AccountInfo_Period
data.value: While the account is active + 30 days

data.name: Privacy_DataDeletion
data.value: When data is no longer needed for the purposes for which it was collected, we will securely delete it using methods that make recovery impossible.

data.name: Privacy_Section7_GDPR_Access_Desc
data.value: Request copies of your personal data

data.name: Privacy_Section7_GDPR_Erasure_Desc
data.value: Request deletion of your personal data

data.name: Privacy_Section7_GDPR_Restriction_Desc
data.value: Limit the processing of your data

data.name: Privacy_Section7_GDPR_Portability_Desc
data.value: Receive your data in a structured format

data.name: Privacy_Section7_GDPR_Objection_Desc
data.value: Object to the processing of your data

data.name: Privacy_Section7_CCPA_KnowCollected
data.value: Know what personal information is collected

data.name: Privacy_Section7_CCPA_KnowSold
data.value: Know if personal information is sold or disclosed

data.name: Privacy_Section7_CCPA_OptOut
data.value: Say no to the sale of personal information

data.name: Privacy_Section7_CCPA_NonDiscrimination
data.value: Not be discriminated against for exercising your rights

data.name: Privacy_Section7_Exercise_Intro
data.value: To exercise any of these rights, you may:

data.name: Privacy_Section7_Exercise_Settings
data.value: Use the privacy settings in your account

data.name: Privacy_Section7_Exercise_Form
data.value: Use our online data request form

data.name: Privacy_Section7_Exercise_Response
data.value: We will respond to your request within 30 calendar days.

data.name: Privacy_Section8_1_Desc
data.value: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us improve your experience and provide personalized features.

data.name: Privacy_Section8_Essential_Desc
data.value: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site:

data.name: Privacy_Section8_Performance_Desc
data.value: To understand how users interact with our site:

data.name: Privacy_Section9_Desc
data.value: We may transfer your personal information to countries outside your jurisdiction to provide our services. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws.

data.name: Privacy_Section10_Desc1
data.value: Our service is not directed to children under 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18.

data.name: Privacy_Section10_Desc2
data.value: If we discover that we have collected information from a child under 18 without verifiable parental consent, we will take steps to delete that information from our servers.

data.name: Privacy_Section10_Desc3
data.value: If you believe we may have information from a child under 18, please contact us immediately at privacy@wahub.com.

data.name: Privacy_Section11_Desc1
data.value: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.

data.name: Privacy_Section11_1_Change1
data.value: We will post the updated policy on this page

data.name: Privacy_Section11_1_Change2
data.value: We will update the "last updated" date

data.name: Privacy_Section11_1_Change3
data.value: For important changes, we will send notification by email

data.name: Privacy_Section11_1_Change4
data.value: For significant changes, we will request your renewed consent

data.name: Privacy_Section11_2_Desc1
data.value: We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Desc1
data.value: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, you can contact us:

data.name: Privacy_Section12_EURep_Desc
data.value: For EU residents, our representative is:

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_Desc
data.value: At WaHub, privacy is not just a legal obligation, but a core value. We are committed to:

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_1
data.value: Being transparent about our data practices

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_2
data.value: Giving you control over your personal information

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_3
data.value: Protecting your data with the best security measures

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_4
data.value: Responding quickly to your questions and requests

data.name: Privacy_Section12_Commitment_5
data.value: Maintaining high privacy standards in everything we do

data.name: Testimonial1Text
data.value: "Wahub completely transformed our notification system. Integration was incredibly easy."

data.name: Testimonial2Text
data.value: "The fastest and most reliable API we have used. Technical support is exceptional."

data.name: Testimonial3Text
data.value: "We climb 1,000 to 100,000 messages without problems. The platform is incredibly stable."

data.name: Privacy_ServiceUsage_History
data.value: History for the use of functions

data.name: Privacy_Intro1
data.value: In Wahub, we deeply value your privacy and commit ourselves to protect your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disseminate and protect your information when you use our WhatsApp automation service.

data.name: Privacy_Intro2
data.value: When using Wahub, you accept the practices described in this policy. If you do not agree with our privacy practices, you should not use our service.

data.name: Privacy_QuickSummary1
data.value: ✅ We only collect necessary data for the service

data.name: Privacy_QuickSummary2
data.value: ✅ We do not sell your personal data

data.name: Privacy_QuickSummary3
data.value: ✅ You can delete your data at any time

data.name: Privacy_QuickSummary4
data.value: ✅ We comply with GDPR and other privacy regulations

data.name: Privacy_PaymentInfo_Processors
data.value: The complete details of credit cards are processed directly by our secure payment processors (Stripe, Paypal) and are never stored on our servers.

data.name: Privacy_WhatsAppData_Note
data.value: WhatsApp messages are processed only to provide the requested service and are not permanently stored on our servers unless you specifically configure it.

data.name: Privacy_TechInfo_Intro
data.value: We automatically collect certain technical information:

data.name: Privacy_TechInfo_IP
data.value: IP address and approximate geographic location

data.name: Pricing_Description
data.value: Start for free and scale as you need. No contracts, no surprises.

data.name: Pricing_FreePlan_Description
data.value: Perfect for personal projects and testing

data.name: Pricing_ProPlan_Description
data.value: Ideal for small and medium businesses

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_ChangePlan_Q
data.value: Can I change my plan at any time?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_ChangePlan_A
data.value: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan whenever you want. Changes apply immediately.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_Limit_Q
data.value: What happens if I exceed my message limit?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_Limit_A
data.value: We will notify you when you are close to the limit. You can upgrade your plan or buy additional messages.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_NGO_Q
data.value: Do you offer discounts for NGOs?

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_NGO_A
data.value: Yes, we offer special discounts for non-profit organizations. Contact us for more information.

data.name: Pricing_FAQ_Setup_A
data.value: No, there are no setup costs or hidden fees. You only pay for what you use.

data.name: Pricing_CTA_Description
data.value: Join over 10,000 developers who trust WaHub

data.name: Contact_Lead
data.value: Have questions? We'd love to help. Get in touch with our team.

data.name: Contact_Message_Placeholder
data.value: Tell us how we can help you...

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Lead
data.value: Answers to the most common questions we receive from our clients

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Response_Q
data.value: How long does it take to receive a response?

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Response_A
data.value: We respond to all emails within 24 hours on business days. For urgent inquiries, we recommend using our WhatsApp chat for a faster response.

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Language_Q
data.value: Do you offer support in English?

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Language_A
data.value: Of course! Our support team is available in Spanish, English, and other languages. Feel free to contact us in the language you feel most comfortable with.

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Demo_Q
data.value: Can I schedule a personalized demo?

data.name: Contact_FAQ_Demo_A
data.value: Yes, we offer free personalized demos where we will show you all the features of our platform. Our sales team will be happy to tailor the demo to your specific needs.

data.name: Contact_FAQ_NGO_Q
data.value: Are there discounts for non-profit organizations?

data.name: Contact_FAQ_NGO_A
data.value: Yes, we offer special pricing for NGOs, educational, and non-profit organizations. Contact us for more information about our discount programs.

data.name: Contact_FAQ_NotFound
data.value: Can't find what you're looking for?

data.name: Contact_Validation_Privacy
data.value: You must accept the privacy policy and terms of service

data.name: Contact_Alert_Success
data.value: Message sent successfully! We will contact you soon.

data.name: Contact_Alert_Error
data.value: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

data.name: ApiDocs_Intro_Description
data.value: WaHub provides a simple yet powerful REST API to integrate WhatsApp into your applications. With just a few lines of code, you can send messages, receive webhooks, and manage contacts.

data.name: ApiDocs_Intro_InfoBox_Content
data.value: Our API is designed to help you integrate WhatsApp into your application in less than 5 minutes.

data.name: ApiDocs_ResponseFormat_Description
data.value: All API responses are in JSON format:

data.name: ApiDocs_Auth_Description
data.value: WaHub uses API Keys to authenticate requests. Your API Key can be found in your dashboard.

data.name: ApiDocs_Auth_WarningBox_Content
data.value: Do not expose your API Key in frontend code. Use it only in your backend.

data.name: ApiDocs_QuickStart_Description
data.value: Send your first WhatsApp message in less than 2 minutes:

data.name: ApiDocs_QuickStart_Step1_Content
data.value: Register on WaHub and get your API Key from the dashboard.

data.name: ApiDocs_QuickStart_Step2_Content
data.value: Scan the QR code to connect your WhatsApp number.

data.name: ApiDocs_SendMessages_Description
data.value: Send different types of messages using the WaHub API.

data.name: ApiDocs_SendMessages_PostEndpoint_Description
data.value: Send a text, image, document, or any other type of content message.

data.name: ApiDocs_SendMessages_Parameters_Type_Desc
data.value: Message type: text, image, document, audio, video

data.name: ApiDocs_Webhooks_Description
data.value: Receive real-time notifications when events occur in your WhatsApp instance.

data.name: ApiDocs_Webhooks_Config_Description
data.value: Configure your webhook URL in the WaHub dashboard. When an event occurs, we will send a POST to your endpoint.
